pullrequest.title: Refactored the joint control widget so that all three tabs can scroll when many joints are displayed

content.raw:
Hi Jason,
we've merged dev into default, can you try to pull upstream in your fork and update this pull request?

in your forked local repo,

hg pull ssh://hg@bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo

hg merge

hg push

then, go to the pull request link (#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/25/refactored-the-joint-control-widget-so/activity), click "Edit" to update the request.

Thanks,
John
content.html:
